IN.IC: je v ameriški angleščini oblika za preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To wake
ali
to be woken
pomeni znova priti v budno stanje, potem ko smo spali.

seg.quote: I sometimes wake at four in the morning.

sense.def:
One's waking hours
je čas, ko je človek buden in ne spi.

seg.quote: I spend most of my waking hours in the library.

sense.def:
To leave something in one's wake
pomeni, da nekdo nekaj pusti za seboj, ko odide.

seg.quote: They left trails of sweet papers in their wake.

sense.def:
Kadar neka stvar sledi
in the wake of another
, se zgodi potem, ko se neka druga stvar konča, pogosto kot njena posledica.

seg.quote: Famine came in the wake of disastrous floods.

sense.def:
To wake up
ali
to be woken up
pomeni priti spet v budno stanje, potem ko smo spali.

To wake up to a dangerous situation
pomeni zavesti se nevarnih okoliščin.

seg.quote: The West began to wake up to the danger it faced.
